hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: hw_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mandatory; QA hardware to use to run the smoke tempest tests, e.g. 2, 3

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cct_tests
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: List of tests separated by plus sign, e.g. features:base+feature:scale:cirros

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: cct_skip_func_tests
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: qa_crowbarsetup.sh runs all functional tests by default. Set to 0 if you want to run those tests

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; scenario name which typically is an integer with a single letter

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_job_name
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; name of the scenario jenkins job that is used to trigger this tempest smoke test

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: scenario_build_number
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Optional; scenario build number associated with this scenario jenkins job
